card.name: Marrow Ooze, the Twister
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ When this creature attacks a player, destroy it after the attack.

card.name: Ragnarok, the Clock
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, skip the rest of the turn.

card.name: Guzari, Misfortune Demon 23
card.text: ■ When you put this creature into the battle zone, put the top 2 cards of your deck into your graveyard.

card.name: Girizombie, Bakeneko
card.text: ■ Blocker ■ Whenever a card is put into the battle zone from your graveyard, if this card is in your graveyard, at the End Step

card.name: Dondon Blizzard Now
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ Look at the top 5 cards of your deck. Reveal one and put it into your hand, then put the rest on the bottom of your deck in any order. If a light or darkness card was revealed in this way, you may choose a creature in the battle zone and return it to its owner's hand.

card.name: Zanboron, Gig
card.text: ■ This creature can't attack. ■ Whenever you tap this creature using the "Mugen Climb" ability, draw a card.

card.name: Dugenda, Gig
card.text: ■ When you put this creature, draw 2 cards then discard 2 cards.

card.name: Dorokio Gai, Climb
card.text: ■ Mugen Climb ■ Shield Trigger ■ Blocker ■ Whenever this creature taps, choose one of your opponent's creatures. That creature can't attack or block until the start of your next turn.

card.name: Weimodel, Gig
card.text: ■ Shield Trigger ■ When you put this creature, put the top 3 cards of your deck into your graveyard. Then put a creature that costs 3 or less from your graveyard into the battle zone.
